items.name: Pieces
items.description: Get to know your chess army and learn how to combat enemy pieces.

items.name: How to Win Enemy Pieces and not Lose Yours
items.description: Some chess pieces are way more powerful and hence valuable than others. Your goal is to initiate favorable trades and avoid making bad deals.

items.name: More About the Pieces
items.description: Learn more about pieces' strengths and weaknesses and how to exploit them in your games.

items.name: Pawn Endgame Basics
items.description: Pawn endgames may be deceivingly simple at first glance, yet they require knowledge of typical ideas and long, precise calculation.
